text: Peder Nissen (born 22 December 1976) was a former Danish badminton player. Born and raised in Ikast, Nissen began his career in Ikast at the age of six. He was two times been Danish National champion, has been active for 13 years as a coach in his hometown, and in 2013, he took the chairman in Ikast FS. == Achievements == === World Junior Championships === Boys' doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
